title: My Google pixel 2 won't connect to my printer. I've tried host/Ip address and wifi direct.
content: Tried to connect my pixel 2 to a HP officejet 3830 my previous pixel 2 was able to connect via Wi-Fi direct. but now my new Google pixel 2 will not connect I've tried connecting via hostname via IP address and via Wi-Fi direct. The printer is saying that the phone is timing out for the connection. The phone finds the right printer but doesn't seem to be making a handshake correctly.
